Metadata.Title: 2096 - Reliance on Cookies in a Decision

Content.Data:
Content for CWE ID: 784

Checkmarx Rule

QueryId : 2096
Cwe : 784
IsExecutable : true
IsEncrypted : false
Severity : 1
PackageId : 36
Status : Original
Type : Regular

Source

 CxList cookies = 
	All.FindByMemberAccess("request.getCookies");

CxList cond = Find_Conditions();

result = cond.DataInfluencedBy(cookies);
